document.docAuthor: Kolicka, Małgorzata, Kisielewski, Jacek, Nesteruk, Teresa & Zawierucha, Krzysztof
document.masterDocTitle: Gastrotricha from the Poznań Palm House — one new subgenus and three new species of freshwater Chaetonotida (Gastrotricha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Gastrotricha from the Poznań Palm House — one new subgenus and three new species of freshwater Chaetonotida (Gastrotricha)

subSubSection.paragraph: A polyphyletic subgenus in terms of molecular data (Kånneby et al. 2013 ), encompasses 28 nominal freshwater species and 10 marine species (Todaro & d'Hondt 2013 ). Present in benthic and periphytic habitats.
